response.title: Omnicharge: Most Powerful Dual USB-C Power Bank
response.tagline: Power nearly any device with two USB-C Ports & two USB-A Fast-Charging ports. Hub for File Transfer.

latest_updates.text:
Dear Omni Family and Friends,

Today we are making an official announcement that Omnicharge is back on Indiegogo to launch our newest product the Omni USB-C power bank! We have been quietly doing a pre-launch in August to fine tune and ramp up the campaign. We really appreciate all the support and emails from our original backers that have shown support by pledging over $200,000 prior to this official launch.

Omni USB-C is designed to be best in class with the latest and greatest technology. We have included two USB-C ports, both bi-directional, with 100W combined output, with each port set at max 60watts. Included in our design, we’ve also made it possible to use the USB-C and USB-A ports as a data hub for all your devices that need to be connected to your laptops. This is a convenience that we think is useful for professionals on the go.

Here is a product walk-through video we recently filmed for the community; check it out and please give us your comments!

We are really excited to be launching on crowdfunding first, since we want to give our community the chance to purchase one before going to retail. This is a way for us to thank our community by launching our newest products with you first.

Also we just activated a referral program with Indiegogo. All you have to do is share the campaign on social media. Make sure to log-in to your IGG account to obtain your personal code (check out the walk-through HERE). We will rebate $10 per pledge that you’ve shared with your family and friends up to $100. So please help us spread the campaign on the web and let’s get this show on the road!

Your Omnicharge TeamPowering Your Passion

response.title: SMOVE: Smartphone Stabilizers & PowerBank in One
response.tagline: Intelligent stabilizers for your smartphone or action camera, easily portable with pro features.

latest_updates.text:
SMOVE PRO backers - when should you use the counterweight?

 

BALANCING: In the above photo, an iPhone 7plus is shown with a counterweight and without a counterweight.  Notice the position of the phone inside the cradle, and that in both photos, SMOVE PRO is powered OFF and standing on its own fully balanced with the 7plus phone inside.

 

As a general rule of thumb, if you have up to a plus size phone such as the 7 Plus, you do not need to use the counterweight. It's only when you start adding more weight to it with an external case that you'd want to counter the weight of it to make sure it's balanced. Prior to powering on your SMOVE PRO, make sure to balance your phone along the horizontal axis. Please take the time to watch the below tutorial and Follow this YouTube channel:

 

 

 

INSIDE LOOK: We're proud to share with backers an inside look into meticulous manufacturing and quality control performed on each SMOVE. We are now producing and shipping every week, and we hope to grow the line in the coming months. To celebrate this major accomplishment with backers, we are offering a secret perk below.

Inside look at some of the many production and manufacturing steps.

Another batch ready to ship out from the factory to fulfillment worldwide!

 

SMOVE PRO Secret Perk for Backers Only

 

SMOVE backers only - there's still time to get SMOVE PRO at a great price, this is the secret perk for backers only.

 

SHIPPING NOW: Have a specific order inquiry? Please use this form to submit your request. This greatly assists our staff with the support process. SMOVE PRO backers, as reported per the previous update 21 the shipping timeline is:

SMOVE PRO backer < June 1 – shipping ETA Aug 17-21

SMOVE PRO backer > June 1 – shipping ETA Aug 21-30

All backers receive tracking once your perk ships.

 

 

Next campaign update: On/about September 10.

 

THANK YOU!

 

 

Check out Plug!

PLUG: The World's Most Powerful Battery Pack​

Ultra-high capacity battery pack with two AC wall outlets and solar charging. CLICK HERE to get a 30% Discount!

response.title: Bolt: World's 1st USB-C Magnetic Cable For MacBook
response.tagline: World’s first USB-C magnetic cable with support for 87W charging of 13", 15" Mac and USB-C devices.

latest_updates.text:
Thank you so much for joining us. You are about to explore the first ever magnetic USB-C cable for 87W 15-inch MacBook! 

Choosing a cable for your MacBook is not as easy as you think, using a poor quality USB-C cable can affect the charging speed, in the worst case scenario, it may destroy your computer!

One of the supporters has recently expressed his concern about the potential overheating of USB-C cables. This is true, using just any USB-C charging cable may easily lead to overheating, yet, choosing the Bolt are guaranteed for safety as it contains a premium chipset to identify the current capabilities, preventing the cable from being overheated while maintaining ultra high charging speed, it will definitely give you peace of mind.

 

It's only 11 days left for our crowdfunding campaign, and the retail price of the Bolt would be back to $50 instead of $24 once the camp finished. Don't miss out the final chance to grab the world’s first USB-C magnetic cable for your MacBook with a 52% big discount!

We’ve been excited to unlock the desktop cable organizer after reached $90,000 stretch goal, please keep on sharing the Bolt and help to reach the stretch goal to unlock the OTG USB-C to USB adapter at $120,000:

Referral program

All you have to do is refer contributors to our campaign.

If your referrals pledged to the campaign, you will get our products for FREE.

Want to know how the referral program works, simply click here.

 

Thanks,Vinpok Team

response.title: Gemini PDA Android & Linux keyboard mobile device
response.tagline: Bringing the keyboard personal digital assistant into the 21st century. Type and create on the move!

latest_updates.text:
Report from the China Factory Visit and General Update - Part #4

Timeline Update

Currently the project plan is saying that we are on track for a first test production run in October 2017, when we will validate the production process and device quality.  The first mass production run is now planned for second week in December 2017. This is about 2-3 weeks later than originally planned, but we will aim to catch up on the time schedule as much as possible. We are keeping a close eye on the timeline.  

First working hardware prototypesWe are also happy to announce that Planet Computers will be showing the first prototypes of the Gemini at Mobile World Congress Americas 2017 which is being held at the Moscone Centre, San Francisco, California, USA, 12th-14th of September 2017.

If you are in the Bay Area or are visiting the show, please come and see us at stand # S.2200B1 in the South Hall of the Moscone centre where the 4YFN event is situated.

Information on the MWC Americas event can be found here https://www.mwcamericas.com/

Travel information to the Moscone Centre can be found here http://www.moscone.com/

We hope that you enjoyed this update.

We will publish the final device specification in about a week, prior to the MWC Americas show.

Best regards,Team Gemini

latest_updates.text:
Shipping Update

We will soon begin shipping Indiegogo perks around mid March 2017 after we have finished fulfilling Kickstarter rewards around that same time.

If you have donated on and before March 1, 2017, your perk will ship around mid March 2017

For donations after March 1, 2017, your perk will ship in early to mid April 2017

Delivery will take place between 1-2 weeks from time of shipping.

Cheers!

HYPER++

response.title: Pocket Tripod - The only phone tripod you need.
response.tagline: A tripod that works with Android and iPhone cases. This card-size tripod can adjust to any angle.

latest_updates.text:
Production Has Begun!

 

Dear backers,

We’re back from visiting our manufacturer and we’re excited to let you know that production is finally underway. During the last few days at the factory we had a chance to film the production process and we’ve put together a short video for you to see.

 

Why tooling has taken this long

Once we visited the factory, we realized that most of our manufacturer’s staff who had worked on making the first Pocket Tripod (2013) were no longer with the company. So the new engineers and mold builders who were making the current molds were not familiar with the intricacies of the product and were making mistakes, which caused delays due to rework. Of course, the staff change wasn’t something that they informed us about before we gave them the project.

It took us over 5 weeks of working with the manufacturer to identify and resolve the issues. We also used this opportunity to train the new staff and ensure that they fully understand our requirements and standards.

The injection molding process itself also required troubleshooting and optimization. The parts are incredibly sensitive to injection parameters, as well as the material composition. So we experimented with an exhaustive range of materials and settings to make sure that we’re getting perfectly consistent results.

 

Production status

We’ve already begun producing the components and will begin assembly and packaging as soon as we have enough build-up of parts. Making the adapters is especially time consuming, since each part needs to go through a secondary process to mold the soft-touch TPU over it. So we don’t want to promise any exact dates at the moment, as we can’t know for sure until each phase is complete. But our best estimate is that we should be at the packaging and shipping phase in approximately five weeks.

 

Changes to your details

In the meantime, we’ll be keeping BackerKit open until we start shipping. If you need to make changes to your shipping address, or size/color selection, please click the link below. For any other requests, please send us a private message or email our support team. (Support@Pocket-Tripod.com)

Update my details ->  

 

As always, thank you for your continued support. We’re excited to get the rewards shipped as soon as possible. We’ll be keeping you updated as we complete each milestone.

Your friends at Geometrical

latest_updates.text:
Hi Backers,

For the past few days, we've been inundated with news about Hurricane Harvey everytime we've been on the internet or social media. We feel devastated after we've seen footage of the destruction left behind and our hearts go out to the people of Texas. We are praying for the safety of all those affected.

 

Myself and the entire team at asap Technologies would like to do what we can to help assist the people of Texas by making a donation to the American Red Cross and we would like to encourage our backers to join us in support. The American Red Cross is working around the clock along the Gulf Coast to help the thousands of people whose lives have been devastated by Tropical Storm Harvey in which there have been over 30 confirmed deaths.

With every purchase of our 'HURRICANE HARVEY FUND' secret perk, you will receive 5 x asap X-Connect (2nd generation) cable sets. 

CLICK HERE TO SUPPORT THE CAUSE

50% of net proceeds will be donated to the American Red Cross. 

HELP DONATE TO RED CROSS TO SUPPORT THE PEOPLE OF TEXAS

This perk will be valid until Thursday 7th September as we plan to send the donation to the American Red Cross on this date. 

Looking forward to simplifying your life,

Vinson Leow

__________________________________________________________

Check out these other great campaigns we love.

Touch - Ultra Small Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds

Touch are the first earbuds to feature Bluetooth 5.0 technology. Stunning design with touch sensor technology, secure fit ergonomics, German engineered battery, and industry leading range. Get up to 52% off! Limited time only. CLICK HERE.

 

Blooms Privé: The World's First Period-Friendly Travel PantyPIC

Made for the modern woman, Blooms Privé will take care of you any day of the week, all month long, and it's why we believe it's the only kind of underwear you'll ever want to wear...From the creators of the most revolutionary underwear for women, Blooms Privé is the #1 panty in Kickstarter fashion. Blooms Privé is the only underwear in the world that allows you to change conveniently and discreetly, anytime and anywhere! You have to watch their video to see how it works. CLICK HERE

latest_updates.text:
Dear AirLink Backers,

We're so excited that we're now entering the last step of delivery: shipping address confirmation. Please kindly fill the survey for shipping address using this link.

Fill Out Google Forms

After your confirmation, we will lock your order. Please kindly confirm your shipping address at your earliest convenience so that we could ship your AirLinks as soon as possible. We will send another confirmation for your free cable organizers (if applicable) later.

We hate this but we have to postpone the shipping date to early September. The reason is that we decided to optimize your experience by updating the battery capacity from 200 mAh to 230 mAh, so the provider delayed the supply by 10 days. Everything seemed ready except the battery. These are some newest images from the factory.

 

Cheers,

Neorb Lab Team

response.title: ASAP Connect: The future of USB cables

latest_updates.text:
Hi Backers,

For the past few days, we've been inundated with news about Hurricane Harvey everytime we've been on the internet or social media. We feel devastated after we've seen footage of the destruction left behind and our hearts go out to the people of Texas. We are praying for the safety of all those affected.

 

Myself and the entire team at asap Technologies would like to do what we can to help assist the people of Texas by making a donation to the American Red Cross and we would like to encourage our backers to join us in support. The American Red Cross is working around the clock along the Gulf Coast to help the thousands of people whose lives have been devastated by Tropical Storm Harvey in which there have been over 30 confirmed deaths.

With every purchase of our 'HURRICANE HARVEY FUND' secret perk, you will receive 5 x asap X-Connect (2nd generation) cable sets. 

CLICK HERE TO SUPPORT THE CAUSE

50% of net proceeds will be donated to the American Red Cross. 

HELP DONATE TO RED CROSS TO SUPPORT THE PEOPLE OF TEXAS

This perk will be valid until Thursday 7th September as we plan to send the donation to the American Red Cross on this date. 

Looking forward to simplifying your life,

Vinson Leow

latest_updates.text:
Hi Backers,

There are still a fair amount of International backers who have not yet sent back their 110V PLUG units using the labels we have previously provided. If this is you, please take the survey linked below so we can best help you in returning the incorrect PLUG so that we may send you the correct 220V PLUG. We have also sent the survey to your email address.

https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/NJGPTR5

 

Solar Panels are set to start shipping out by the end of the week so be on the lookout for tracking information being emailed to you!

 

That's all the new information we have for you now. We'll post another update once the solar panels have begun to ship.

 

Check Out These Awesome Campaigns

 

Betterspot: A Smart VPN Router for All Devices 

 

Betterspot is an easy-to-use VPN router that provides you online security and privacy. With Betterspot, you can access blocked websites and surf the net anonymously. Betterspot is portable so that you can use it as a home or a travel router. You can also use it at your office. Click Here to get 25% Discount! 

 

 

EcoReco Model R & XS: Ultimate Personal EV for All

 

Safer than a skateboard and more portable than a bike, the EcoReco Model R is the ultimate personal transportation for daily commutes and weekend adventures. It’s packed with smart features - Dynamic Battery Switching System, kick-assist modes, Carefree Fall Detection, Lightvigation, Tile™ Tracking, anti-theft and has endless reconfigurability. And if that weren’t enough, the Model R can climb hills up to 35% and let you go 500 miles on just $1 of electricity! The EcoReco Model R makes that last commuting mile a blast. Find out why riders, celebs, athletes and tech companies, like Sony and Tile, think it's genius. igg.me/at/ecoreco EcoReco also offers the ultra-portable and affordable XS as the best last mile companion, don't miss the special time-limited introductory price.

 

 

The HEXAD Duffel: The Ultimate Carryall and Travel Companion 

 

Our friends over at WANDRD just launched their new line of premium duffel bags that are the perfect carryall/travel companion. Whether you are going out of the country for several weeks or simply hauling gear for the afternoon, these duffels can handle it all. Back The Project and get in on the Kickstarter discounts before they’re gone!

response.title: The MotherBox - TRUE Wireless Charging
response.tagline: The first wireless charging product that isn't tethered to your device. REAL wireless charging.

latest_updates.text:
Hello backers!

 

Thank you all very much for your help with the survey we sent out several weeks ago. We really appreciate your feedback. Based on the survey results, we have decided to upgrade the exterior design and include a touch sensor for the on/off button on top of the MotherBox and MotherBox Mini.

We have also been experiencing challenges developing the production line for the 3D antenna array and have decided to dedicate more time to refining the production process because of their importance in the wireless charging system. Thus, we have updated the current expected delivery date on our timeline from October to November, and may need to dedicate another additional month depending on the results we receive over the course of the next month.

The difficulty with producing these antennas is that they have depth to them, so traditional antenna production methods aren’t applicable, such as those for microstrip antennas. Furthermore, the antennas are hollow and need to be arranged in a perpendicular format, which further complicates the production and assembly processes you can use. Thus, we have been developing a new kind of production process for the antennas with our partner BSG.

 

The antennas are very important because they guide the charge to your devices and the effectiveness of the antennas allows them to charge your devices at a distance, so it’s critical that the antennas are developed very precisely.

 

To help us with this process, we have also brought on Eric Chan, the Founder of ECCO Design, a highly esteemed product design and realization company, as an advisor to help us overcome these challenges.

 

Thank you for your continued support and help!

 

The Yank Tech Team

We’re currently very happy with how things are moving along for the final modifications we needed to make to PowerUp’s external case moulding. With this said, we’re pleased to announce that we will start shipping out the first batches of orders beginning August 26! Talk to you soon,

response.title: Zero Breeze - The World’s Coolest Portable AC Unit
response.tagline: Portable, Smart, Multifunctional Air Conditioner that includes a bluetooth speaker, night light etc.

latest_updates.text:
ZERO BREEZE TROUBLESHOOTING INSTRUCTIONS

 

Hello backers!

 

We have received massive amounts of feedback from you, and we’re listening carefully. Listed below are a majority of the problems people have been asking about.

 

Q1: Why does the compressor kick off after 10 minutes? 

Q2: Why does the unit shut down after a few minutes?

Q3: Why does the transformer start melting?

Q4: Why does the fan not work?

(To answer all of these...)

A: The transformer suppliers didn’t do a great job for us. We required them to provide a 180-watt transformer, but they didn’t check these carefully and stuck some low current transformers in the batch (about two percent). This is why some of you have problems, some of the transformers’ currents are not high enough.

For people who are experiencing these problems, we will send another transformer ASAP. Please send us an email with the subject title “Transformer Replacement” and with a short video to describe your problem.

 

Q1: The transformer is pretty hot while it’s working, is it safe?

A: Yes, it’s safe as long as the temperature is under 194 F.

 

Q1: The condensation water comes out from the power supply area, what can I do?

A: Please keep the rear part of drain pipe lower than the unit itself, after running the Zero Breeze unit for a while, you can manually squeeze the drainage pipe, then the water will drain smoothly. We also designed a hole under the power supply area to protect the power plug from being submerged. In any case, even if it’s soaked it still can work perfectly, as it’s water-proof.

 

Q: It’s a little bit noisy, what can I do?

A: You’d better place it on the ground or soft carpet, instead of on hollow objects that cause resonance of the running machine.

 

Q: What kind of tent should we use?

A: We recommend you use a tent with a great insulation function.

 

Here’s good news! The next batch of Zero Breeze units will be sent out by the end of August, and all the battery banks will be sent out in September. As we are developing this product, we will try our best to meet the top notch quality we want. If there are issues, we will tackle them as best we can and find solutions. Please give us your trust and patience. We want to make an awesome product, and if we succeed, it will be a game changer. We’re sorry for the inconvenience and thank you so much for your understanding.

 

Zero Breeze Support: hello@zero-breeze.com
